int clear[] = {143,142,141,140,139,138,137,136,135,134,133,132,131,130,129,128,117,118,119,120,121,122,106,105,104,103,102,101,149,150,151,152,153,154,169,168,167,166,86,87,88,89,241,237,211,203,181,248,231,216,199,184,186,196,220,226,254,16,46,50,76,84,71,56,39,24,7,91,67,61,33,31};
for (int i = 0; i < 72; i++){
leds[clear[i]] = CHSV( 40,155,100);
}
FastLED.show();
